channel.title: Anynines on Drone
channel.description: Recent content in Anynines on Drone

item.title: Anynines
item.description:
Use this plugin for deplying an application to Anynines. You can override the default configuration with the following parameters:

  • username - Username for Anynines
  • password - Password for Anynines
  • organization - Target organization for Anynines
  • space - Target space for Anynines
  • skip_cleanup - Flag to deploy from the current file state

Example

The following is a sample configuration in your .drone.yml file:

deploy:
  anynines:
    username: octocat@github.com
    password: password
    organization: octocat_github_com
    space: production
    when:
      branch: master
